page.title: 09MR THORPE AT WORK
page.content: 05.00 woke up read book till 0645 got up,let Tammy, Tiger and Sheba out. 07.45 washed and shaved. 08.10 finished breakfast 08.10 drove car to office at Beverley bought petrol at Routh . 08.30 arrived at office (St. Mary's Manor,Ministry of Agriculture Fisheries & Food). Worked in the office until 12.45. Set off in car to Denby Dale, West Yorkshire.To survey Hill farms on Pennines. 16.00 Returned via Sheffield, M1, M18 M62. 17.45 arrived home,had tea. 18.30 haircut,after, watched T.V till 19.15, then worked in garden till 20.45 . Watched T.V. until 22.30.Put cats to bed. 22.45 Time for bed.
